thread.title: Mulvaney Backs Turning CFPB Into Bipartisan Commission

author: Yuka Hayashi
title: Mulvaney Backs Turning CFPB Into Bipartisan Commission

organizations.name: mulvaney backs turning cfpb into bipartisan commission

text:
WASHINGTON—The acting director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau expressed his support for turning the agency into a commission, an idea that is firmly backed by the financial industry but has lost traction in Congress.
Mick Mulvaney, a longtime CFPB critic who has taken steps to overhaul the bureau since assuming his post in November, said moving to a bipartisan commission from a single director would prevent “wild swings” in rules and policies that accompany changes in administrations.
...
